unnormalised: Mr. Rajesh Kumar, a resident of Delhi, has been awarded the 'Citizen of the Year' award by the Delhi Municipal Corporation for his tireless efforts in promoting cleanliness in his locality. The award ceremony, held on 15/08/2024, saw the presence of dignitaries including Hon. CM Arvind Kejriwal.
normalised: Mister Rajesh Kumar, a resident of Delhi, has been awarded the 'Citizen of the Year' award by the Delhi Municipal Corporation for his tireless efforts in promoting cleanliness in his locality. The award ceremony, held on fifteenth August two thousand and twenty four, saw the presence of dignitaries including Honorable C-M Arvind Kejriwal.

unnormalised: Mrs. Fatima Sheikh, a retired school teacher from Mumbai, was felicitated by the local NGO 'Educate India' for her 40 years of dedicated service to education. The event was attended by several former students and colleagues who lauded her contribution in shaping young minds. Dr. Anjali Menon, the head of the NGO, presented her with a certificate of appreciation.
normalised: Missus Fatima Sheikh, a retired school teacher from Mumbai, was felicitated by the local N-G-O 'Educate India' for her forty years of dedicated service to education. The event was attended by several former students and colleagues who lauded her contribution in shaping young minds. Doctor Anjali Menon, the head of the N-G-O, presented her with a certificate of appreciation.

unnormalised: In other news, Kumari. Priya Sharma, a student from a small village in Rajasthan, has secured the 1st rank in the state-level medical entrance exam. Her success story has become an inspiration for many aspiring students in the region. Her father, Shri. Ram Lal Sharma, a farmer, expressed his joy and pride in his daughter’s achievement.

Her success story has become an inspiration for many aspiring students in the region. Her father, Shri Ram Lal Sharma, a farmer, expressed his joy and pride in his daughter’s achievement.
